calendarHelp: You can't create a poll without any options. Add at least one option to continue.
changeNameDescription: Enter a new name for this participant.
changeNameInfo: This will not affect any votes you have already made.
commentPlaceholder: Leave a comment on this poll (visible to everyone)
deleteParticipantDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this participant? This action cannot be undone.
deletePollDescription: All data related to this poll will be deleted. To confirm, please type <s>‚Äú{confirmText}‚Äù</s> in to the input below:
deletingOptionsWarning: You are deleting options that participants have voted for. Their votes will also be deleted.
demoPollNotice: Demo polls are automatically deleted after 1 day
descriptionPlaceholder: Hey everyone, please choose the dates that work for you!
expiredOrInvalidLink: This link is expired or invalid. Please request a new link.
feedbackSent: Thank you! Your feedback has been sent.
loginSuccessful: You're logged in! Please wait while you are redirected‚Ä¶
mixedOptionsDescription: You can't have both time and date options in the same poll. Which would you like to keep?
name: Name
newParticipantFormDescription: Fill in the form below to submit your votes.
notificationsGuest: Log in to turn on notifications
noVotes: No one has voted for this option
redirect: Click here if you are not redirect automatically‚Ä¶
specifyTimesDescription: Include start and end times for each option
title: Title
userAlreadyExists: A user with that email already exists
userNotFound: A user with that email doesn't exist
verificationCodeHelp: Didn't get the email? Check your spam/junk.
verificationCodeSent: A verification code has been sent to {email} Change
wrongVerificationCode: Your verification code is incorrect or has expired
homepage_adFreeDescription: You can give your ad-blocker a rest ‚Äî You won't need it here.
homepage_commentsDescription: Participants can comment on your poll and the comments will be visible to everyone.
homepage_heroSubText: Find the right date without the back and forth
homepage_metaDescription: Create polls and vote to find the best day or time. A free alternative to Doodle.
homepage_mobileFriendlyDescription: Works great on mobile devices so participants can respond to polls wherever they may be.
homepage_noLoginRequiredDescription: You don't need to login to create or participate in a poll.
homepage_notificationsDescription: Keep track of who's responded. Get notified when participants vote or comment on your poll.
homepage_openSourceDescription: The codebase is fully open-source and available on GitHub.
homepage_selfHostableDescription: Run it on your own server to take full control of your data.
homepage_timeSlotsDescription: Set individual start and end times for each option in your poll. Times can be automatically adjusted to each participant's timezone or they can be set to ignore timezones completely.
common_footerSponsor: This project is user-funded. Please consider supporting it by donating.
errors_notFoundDescription: We couldn't find the page you're looking for.
differentOwnerTooltip: This poll was created by a different user
profileDescription: Change your preferred date and time settings
deleteAccountDescription:
Delete your account here.
            This action is not reversible. All information related to this
            account will be deleted permanently.
datesDescription: Select a few dates for your participants to choose from
hostDetailsDescription: Enter your details so we can send you a link to your poll
mangeLinkTooltip: You created this poll, so you have exclusive access to its management page
